dcterms:description: LibriSpeech training set contains 960 hours of speech, where 460 hours of them are 'clean' speech and the other 500 hours are 'noisy' speech. The testing set also consists of a 'clean' and a 'noisy' subset.
dcterms:title: LibriSpeech

dcterms:creator: A. Narayanan
R. Prabhavalkar
C.-C. Chiu
D. Rybach
T. N. Sainath
T. Strohman
dcterms:description: The large-scale dataset consists of approximately 400k hours of English audio-text pairs from multiple domains, such as YouTube and anonymized voice search traffic.
dcterms:title: Large-scale datasets (internal dataset)

dcterms:creator: A. Narayanan
R. Prabhavalkar
C.-C. Chiu
D. Rybach
T. N. Sainath
T. Strohman
dcterms:description: The Voice Search test set contains around 12k voice search utterances, each having an average length of 5.5 seconds.
dcterms:title: Voice Search
